Welcome to the latest edition of our newsletter, where we delve into an inspiring case study that underscores the power of strategic expertise, innovative financing, and unwavering determination. We also celebrate a remarkable legal triumph: our legal team successfully overturned a lower court decision that was detrimental to subrogated insurers, effectively arguing that foreign jurisdiction clauses in Bills of Lading do not apply to insurers who were not party to the original contract.

View this email in your browser <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/bDbICo6w4Uv3w1OuJcxUpxabT?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com>  	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/WjgBCpXx5fA3wJYUqfpUG0JOW?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
Welcome to the latest edition of our newsletter, where we delve into an inspiring case study that underscores the power of strategic expertise, innovative financing, and unwavering determination. We also celebrate a remarkable legal triumph: our legal team successfully overturned a lower court decision that was detrimental to subrogated insurers, effectively arguing that foreign jurisdiction clauses in Bills of Lading do not apply to insurers who were not party to the original contract.

Furthermore, this edition provides updates on our recent business trips, meetings with key clients, participation in Fruit Logistica, and exploration of global opportunities.
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/0714c6f8-53e4-829c-df37-161e68a6c93f.jpg> 	

ARBITRATION TRIUMPH: DEFYING LIMITATIONS

Furthermore, this edition provides updates on our recent business trips, meetings with key clients, participation in Fruit Logistica, and exploration of global opportunities.
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/0714c6f8-53e4-829c-df37-161e68a6c93f.jpg> 	

ARBITRATION TRIUMPH: DEFYING LIMITATIONS


In a scenario where contamination appeared undetectable and recovery prospects seemed nonexistent, our team defied expectations. This case study delves into how strategic expertise, innovative financing, and unwavering determination transformed a near-dismissed claim into a full award within an unprecedented timeframe. Discover how we navigated complex maritime law and technical challenges to deliver exceptional results, proving that even the most daunting cases can yield extraordinary outcomes.
 
Check out the full case here <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/espICqMy4TXj2xqs7hEUEIMtF?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> .
 


Back to index
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/b87bc08c-3b81-b068-14b2-a5262f6bbf8f.jpg> 	

DECISÃO JUDICIAL

 
A BARBUSS, tem o orgulho de anunciar uma vitória jurídica de grande impacto!

Nossa equipe jurídica reverteu uma decisão de primeira instância que prejudicava seguradoras sub-rogadas, defendendo com sucesso a tese de que cláusulas de eleição de foro estrangeiro em Conhecimentos de Embarque não se aplicam à seguradoras que não fizeram parte do contrato original.

Nossa equipe jurídica reverteu uma decisão de primeira instância que prejudicava seguradoras sub-rogadas, defendendo com sucesso a tese de que cláusulas de eleição de foro estrangeiro em Conhecimentos de Embarque não se aplicam à seguradoras que não fizeram parte do contrato original.

Convidamos você a ler os detalhes, você pode encontrar a versão em português e inglês aqui. <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/HyijCrMz4T2lmzgSYi7U4iSY4?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 
 
Back to index
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/h3xoCv9E4IAzlPQU0svUQ1Tw2?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com>

BUSINESS TRIP TO THE MIDDLE EAST

BUSINESS TRIP TO THE MIDDLE EAST 

 
Building strong relationships is key to success, and that's exactly what Pablo De Estrada and Ali Slim accomplished during their recent trip to the Middle East. Visiting clients in the UAE, Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar, Oman, and KSA allowed for deeper connections and a greater understanding of their needs.
 
We're committed to transparent and simple relationships, fostering closeness with our clients. These strengthened partnerships will lead to significant growth and mutual success.
  
 
Back to index

CLOSENESS TO CLIENTS 

 
BARBUSS was pleased to have Paula Seijo, our Marine Claims Manager, meet recently with the Maersk Claims Team in their office in Mumbai, India. This valuable opportunity allowed us to introduce BARBUSS, our lines of business, and our Global Recovery team.
 
We also discussed ongoing cases across all regions, meticulously reviewing each one to identify solutions and expedite resolutions.
 
Back to index
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/B51sCx7J4fxoXgYfPulUyr3wm?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/cc759952-cf42-f915-b44b-713595b68441.jpg> 	

FRUIT LOGISTICA 2025

BARBUSS was pleased to have Paula Seijo, our Marine Claims Manager, meet recently with the Maersk Claims Team in their office in Mumbai, India. This valuable opportunity allowed us to introduce BARBUSS, our lines of business, and our Global Recovery team.
 
We also discussed ongoing cases across all regions, meticulously reviewing each one to identify solutions and expedite resolutions.
 
Back to index
	
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/B51sCx7J4fxoXgYfPulUyr3wm?domain=barbuss.us8.list-manage.com> 	
	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/cd8e5de3dc4b454c0b999b97d/images/cc759952-cf42-f915-b44b-713595b68441.jpg> 	

FRUIT LOGISTICA 2025

 
We had an incredible experience at Fruit Logistica 2025 in Berlin! Juan Manuel de la Vega and Paula Carrasco represented BARBUSS at this mayor event, connecting with key players in the global fruit industry.

The event provided a valuable platform to explore new avenues for innovation and growth. We engaged with potential clients, gained valuable insights into the latest trends and market needs, and showcased our comprehensive Perishable Cargo Insurance, designed to transform the risk industry.

Connect with us to learn more about our Perishable Cargo Insurance and how we can protect your business!  Access to the Key Contact that suits you best:

The event provided a valuable platform to explore new avenues for innovation and growth. We engaged with potential clients, gained valuable insights into the latest trends and market needs, and showcased our comprehensive Perishable Cargo Insurance, designed to transform the risk industry.

Connect with us to learn more about our Perishable Cargo Insurance and how we can protect your business!  Access to the Key Contact that suits you best:

*	Other markets: Jose Antonio Ciancio (jose.ciancio@barbuss.com <mailto:jose.ciancio@barbuss.com> )

MIAMI REINSURANCE WEEK


Miami Reinsurance Week was an insightful discussions and valuable connections! We had the chance to meet with partners and clients from across Latin America, diving into the trends and challenges shaping our market. From technical talks to informal lunches, every interaction was engaging and productive. Thank you to everyone who shared their expertise and made this week a success.
 
We're excited to continue collaborating and transforming the risk industry together.
 
Back to index
